channel.title: Shop Error?
channel.description:
Chapter 1: Adding a Shop Lets start.
First thing to add a shop is to add a shop keeper. Go into your autospawn.cfg (open with notepad++) and put this line in: Code:
spawn = NPC ID X COORD Y COORD 0 0 0 0 0 1 Name Store
I think that most people know what those mean. (The Name Store doesn't go anything so fill it in as you wish)
Next go into shop.cfg
You will probably see something like: Code:
shop = 1 Food and other st00f 1 1
Now if you just want to add more items to the shop after that last 1 tab and then add the id of an item then tab again and put a number for the amount of the item you want. Example: Code:
shop = 1 Food and other st00f 1 1 4151 100
That would add a whip and 100 of them in the shop.
Now if u want to make your own shop add that line from above and change ur shop = 1 to the last number that you have, some servers have 60 shops, others have 10 so check what the last number is.
Next go into client.java and search for Code:
WanneShop =
until you find something like: Code:
else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop }
under that } add this: Code:
else if (NPCID == ID OF NPC) { // Anything here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = (shop = (THIS NUMBER GOES HERE)); // Anything here }
What that does is when you click trade on the NPC it trades with it.
This is the tut I used. I did everything right. Compile worked and when I start up my server I get.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 900 3551" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1792) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code] What does that mean?

item.title: Shop Error?

item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

I’m really sorry I’m bad at this explain what has what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 01:58:00 PM[/size][hr][tt]} else if (NPCID == 1) { // Anything here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; // Anything here } else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; }[/tt]

Is what I put GTG Ill check on this later someone keep it up.

Read full topic

Put EXACTLY what you put down in your files, and please use code tags.

Like this, it makes life easy.

item.title: Shop Error?
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

Chapter 1: Adding a Shop
Lets start.

First thing to add a shop is to add a shop keeper.
Go into your autospawn.cfg (open with notepad++)
and put this line in:
Code:

spawn = NPC ID X COORD Y COORD 0 0 0 0 0 1 Name Store

I think that most people know what those mean. (The Name Store doesn’t go anything so fill it in as you wish)

Next go into shop.cfg

You will probably see something like:
Code:

shop = 1 Food and other st00f 1 1

Now if you just want to add more items to the shop after that last 1 tab and then add the id of an item then tab again and put a number for the amount of the item you want.
Example:
Code:

shop = 1 Food and other st00f 1 1 4151 100

That would add a whip and 100 of them in the shop.

Now if u want to make your own shop add that line from above and change ur shop = 1 to the last number that you have, some servers have 60 shops, others have 10 so check what the last number is.

Next go into client.java and search for
Code:

WanneShop =

until you find something like:
Code:

else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop
}

under that } add this:
Code:

else if (NPCID == ID OF NPC) { // Anything here
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = (shop = (THIS NUMBER GOES HERE)); // Anything here
}

What that does is when you click trade on the NPC it trades with it.

This is the tut I used. I did everything right. Compile worked and when I start up my server I get.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 900 3551" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1792) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:28) What does that mean?

Read full topic
